--[[
    ============================================================
    VANDER TP AND BLOCK - [MOBILE EDITION] V5.3.0
    ============================================================
    UPGRADE: INTEGRATED STEAL HUD + PROGRESS BAR
    ============================================================
]]

-- [SECURITY ENGINE]
local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local HttpService = game:GetService("HttpService")
local UIS = game:GetService("UserInputService")
local LocalPlayer = Players.LocalPlayer

local function isAuthorized()
    local myName = LocalPlayer.Name:lower()

    local status, fault = pcall(function()
        if isfile and isfile("zenith_registry.json") then
            local raw = readfile("zenith_registry.json")
            if not raw or raw == "" then return false end
            local db = HttpService:JSONDecode(raw)
            local myData = db.Scripts and db.Scripts["Vander TP Mobile"]
            
            if myData then
                -- Check Public Access Timer
                if myData.PublicExpiry and tonumber(myData.PublicExpiry) > os.time() then
                    return true
                end

                -- Check Blacklist (Case Insensitive)
                if myData.Blacklist then
                    for bUser, _ in pairs(myData.Blacklist) do
                        if bUser:lower() == myName then
                            LocalPlayer:Kick("\n[VANDER SECURITY]\nYou are Blacklisted from Vander TP Mobile.")
                            return false
                        end
                    end
                end
                
                -- Check Whitelist (Case Insensitive)
                if myData.Whitelist then
                    for wUser, mode in pairs(myData.Whitelist) do
                        if wUser:lower() == myName then return true end
                    end
                end
            end
        end
        return false
    end)
    if status and fault == true then return true end
    LocalPlayer:Kick("\n[VANDER SECURITY]\nAccess Denied.")
    return false
end

if not isAuthorized() then return end

-- [ENVIRONMENT PROTECTION]
task.spawn(function() if not game:IsLoaded() then game.Loaded:Wait() end end)

local TS = game:GetService("TweenService")

local CORE = (gethui and gethui()) or game:GetService("CoreGui")
local STATS = game:GetService("Stats")
local Camera = workspace.CurrentCamera

local viewport = Camera.ViewportSize
local isMobile = (UIS.TouchEnabled and not UIS.KeyboardEnabled) or viewport.X < 900
local MainWidth = isMobile and 580 or 800
local MainHeight = isMobile and 380 or 520
local SideWidth = isMobile and 150 or 200

-- [VANDER STATE]
local Vander = {
    TPBlock = { Enabled = false, SelectedBase = "NONE", TargetPlayer = nil, 
        Coords = {
            LEFT = { Step1 = CFrame.new(-347.9, -7.3, 20.1), Step2 = CFrame.new(-331.9, -5.1, 19.6) },
            RIGHT = { Step1 = CFrame.new(-350.9, -7.3, 100.9), Step2 = CFrame.new(-331.9, -5.1, 101.2) }
        }
    },
    Grab = { Enabled = false, Radius = 20 },
    Visuals = { ESP = false, Names = false },
    Internal = { IsStealing = false, Progress = 0, PinnedButtons = {} }
}

-- [THEME]
local Theme = {
    Main = Color3.fromRGB(10, 15, 25), Sidebar = Color3.fromRGB(5, 8, 15),
    Accent = Color3.fromRGB(0, 255, 255), Text = Color3.fromRGB(255, 255, 255),
    Dim = Color3.fromRGB(150, 180, 200), Border = Color3.fromRGB(0, 150, 180),
    Red = Color3.fromRGB(255, 50, 70), Green = Color3.fromRGB(0, 255, 127)
}

-- [CORE HELPERS]
local function create(c, props)
    local obj = Instance.new(c)
    for k, v in pairs(props or {}) do obj[k] = v end
    return obj
end

local function tween(obj, t, goal, style)
    local tw = TS:Create(obj, TweenInfo.new(t, style or Enum.EasingStyle.Quart, Enum.EasingDirection.Out), goal)
    tw:Play(); return tw
end

local function makeDraggable(obj)
    local d, ds, sp
    obj.InputBegan:Connect(function(i) if i.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton1 or i.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Touch then d = true; ds = i.Position; sp = obj.Position end end)
    obj.InputEnded:Connect(function(i) if i.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton1 or i.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Touch then d = false end end)
    UIS.InputChanged:Connect(function(i) if d and (i.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.MouseMovement or i.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Touch) then local dl = i.Position - ds; obj.Position = UDim2.new(sp.X.Scale, sp.X.Offset + dl.X, sp.Y.Scale, sp.Y.Offset + dl.Y) end end)
end

-- [ENGINE LOGIC]
local function triggerTP()
    if Vander.TPBlock.SelectedBase == "NONE" or not Vander.TPBlock.TargetPlayer then return end
    local chr = LP.Character; local hrp = chr and chr:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart")
    local h = chr and chr:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
    if not hrp or not h then return end
    if h.Sit then h.Sit = false; task.wait(0.1) end
    hrp.AssemblyLinearVelocity = Vector3.zero
    local dat = Vander.TPBlock.Coords[Vander.TPBlock.SelectedBase]
    hrp.CFrame = dat.Step1; task.wait(0.5); hrp.CFrame = dat.Step2; task.wait(0.2)
    pcall(function() game:GetService("StarterGui"):SetCore("PromptBlockPlayer", Vander.TPBlock.TargetPlayer) end)
end

local allAnimalsCache = {}
local function scanPlots() 
    allAnimalsCache = {}; local workspacePlots = workspace:FindFirstChild("Plots")
    if not workspacePlots then return end
    for _, plot in pairs(workspacePlots:GetChildren()) do 
        local podiums = plot:FindFirstChild("AnimalPodiums")
        if podiums then for _, pod in pairs(podiums:GetChildren()) do if pod:FindFirstChild("Base") then table.insert(allAnimalsCache, {plot = plot.Name, slot = pod.Name, pos = pod:GetPivot().Position}) end end end
    end 
end
task.spawn(function() while task.wait(5) do scanPlots() end end)

local function executeSteal(prompt)
    if Vander.Internal.IsStealing then return end
    Vander.Internal.IsStealing = true
    Vander.Internal.Progress = 0
    
    task.spawn(function() 
        local start = tick()
        local duration = 0.6 -- Standard grab time
        while tick() - start < duration do
            Vander.Internal.Progress = (tick() - start) / duration
            task.wait(0.05)
        end
        Vander.Internal.Progress = 1
        
        if fireproximityprompt then 
            pcall(function() fireproximityprompt(prompt) end) 
            else 
            prompt.HoldDuration = 0
            prompt:InputBegan(Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton1)
            prompt:InputEnded(Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton1) 
        end
        
        task.wait(0.2)
        Vander.Internal.IsStealing = false
        Vander.Internal.Progress = 0
    end)
end

RS.Heartbeat:Connect(function()
    if Vander.Grab.Enabled and not Vander.Internal.IsStealing then
        local chr = LP.Character; local hrp = chr and chr:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart")
        if hrp then
        for _, animal in pairs(allAnimalsCache) do 
            if (hrp.Position - animal.pos).Magnitude <= Vander.Grab.Radius then
                local plots = workspace:FindFirstChild("Plots"); local plot = plots and plots:FindFirstChild(animal.plot)
                local podiums = plot and plot:FindFirstChild("AnimalPodiums"); local pod = podiums and podiums:FindFirstChild(animal.slot)
                    local prompt = pod and pod.Base:FindFirstChild("Spawn") and pod.Base.Spawn:FindFirstChild("PromptAttachment") and pod.Base.Spawn.PromptAttachment:FindFirstChildOfClass("ProximityPrompt")
                    if prompt then 
                        executeSteal(prompt)
                        break 
                    end
                end 
            end 
        end
    end
end)

-- [UI SYSTEM]
local MainGui = create("ScreenGui", {Name = "VanderGodMobile", Parent = CORE, IgnoreGuiInset = true})

-- [HUD SYSTEM (STEAL BAR)]
local HUD = create("Frame", {Size = UDim2.new(0, 300, 0, 70), Position = UDim2.new(0.5, -150, 0.9, -15), BackgroundColor3 = Theme.Sidebar, Visible = false, Parent = MainGui})
create("UICorner", {CornerRadius = UDim.new(0, 15), Parent = HUD}); create("UIStroke", {Color = Theme.Accent, Thickness = 2, Parent = HUD})
local HUD_Title = create("TextLabel", {Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 0, 30), Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 8), Text = "GRABBER ACTIVE", TextColor3 = Theme.Text, Font = "GothamBold", TextSize = 14, BackgroundTransparency = 1, Parent = HUD})
local HUD_BarBG = create("Frame", {Size = UDim2.new(0.9, 0, 0, 8), Position = UDim2.new(0.05, 0, 0, 45), BackgroundColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(30, 30, 40), Parent = HUD})
create("UICorner", {CornerRadius = UDim.new(1, 0), Parent = HUD_BarBG})
local HUD_BarFill = create("Frame", {Size = UDim2.fromScale(0, 1), BackgroundColor3 = Theme.Accent, Parent = HUD_BarBG})
create("UICorner", {CornerRadius = UDim.new(1, 0), Parent = HUD_BarFill})
makeDraggable(HUD)

RS.RenderStepped:Connect(function()
    HUD.Visible = Vander.Grab.Enabled
    if Vander.Internal.IsStealing then
        HUD_Title.Text = "STEALING..."; HUD_Title.TextColor3 = Theme.Accent
        HUD_BarFill.Size = UDim2.fromScale(Vander.Internal.Progress, 1)
    else
        HUD_Title.Text = "READY (IN RANGE)"; HUD_Title.TextColor3 = Theme.Dim
        HUD_BarFill.Size = UDim2.fromScale(0, 1)
    end
end)

-- HUD PIN SYSTEM
local function createPinnedButton(name, callback, defaultState, isToggle)
    local btn = create("TextButton", {Size = UDim2.new(0, 50, 0, 50), Position = UDim2.new(0.8, 0, 0.4, 0), BackgroundColor3 = (defaultState and Theme.Accent or Theme.Sidebar), Text = name:sub(1,3):upper(), TextColor3 = (defaultState and Theme.Main or Theme.Text), Font = "GothamBold", TextSize = 10, ZIndex = 5000, Parent = MainGui})
    create("UICorner", {CornerRadius = UDim.new(1,0), Parent = btn}); create("UIStroke", {Color = Theme.Accent, Thickness = 2, Parent = btn}); makeDraggable(btn)
    local state = defaultState
    local function update(ns) if not isToggle then return end; state = ns; btn.BackgroundColor3 = (state and Theme.Accent or Theme.Sidebar); btn.TextColor3 = (state and Theme.Main or Theme.Text) end
    btn.Activated:Connect(function() if isToggle then state = not state; callback(state); update(state) else callback() end end)
    btn.InputBegan:Connect(function(i) if (i.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Touch or i.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton1) then local st = tick(); i.Changed:Connect(function() if i.UserInputState == Enum.UserInputState.End and tick() - st > 2 then btn:Destroy() end end) end end)
end

-- Splash Screen
local Splash = create("Frame", {Size = UDim2.fromScale(1,1), BackgroundColor3 = Theme.Main, ZIndex = 11000, Parent = MainGui})
local Title = create("TextLabel", {Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 0, 100), Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0.45, -50), Text = "VANDER", TextColor3 = Theme.Text, Font = "GothamBold", TextSize = isMobile and 60 or 90, BackgroundTransparency = 1, TextTransparency = 1, ZIndex = 11002, Parent = Splash})

create("UIStroke", {Color = Theme.Accent, Thickness = 2, Parent = Line})

    task.wait(3); tween(Title, 0.8, {TextTransparency = 1}); tween(Line, 0.8, {Size = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 4), Position = UDim2.new(0.5, 0, 0.45, isMobile and 35 or 60)})
    task.wait(1); tween(Splash, 1, {BackgroundTransparency = 1}); task.wait(1); Splash:Destroy()
end)

create("UICorner", {CornerRadius = UDim.new(0, 10), Parent = TopBar}); create("UIStroke", {Color = Theme.Accent, Thickness = 2, Parent = TopBar}); makeDraggable(TopBar)

local ResBtn = create("TextButton", {Size = UDim2.new(0, 60, 0, 60), Position = UDim2.new(0.05, 0, 0.1, 0), BackgroundColor3 = Theme.Main, Text = "V", TextColor3 = Theme.Accent, Font = "GothamBold", TextSize = 25, Visible = false, Parent = MainGui})
create("UICorner", {CornerRadius = UDim.new(1,0), Parent = ResBtn}); create("UIStroke", {Color = Theme.Accent, Thickness = 2, Parent = ResBtn}); makeDraggable(ResBtn)

local Sidebar = create("Frame", {Size = UDim2.new(0, SideWidth, 1, 0), BackgroundColor3 = Theme.Sidebar, Parent = MainBody})
create("UICorner", {CornerRadius = UDim.new(0, 20), Parent = Sidebar})

local Tabs = {}
function Vander:CreateTab(name)

    create("UIListLayout", {Padding = UDim.new(0, 10), Parent = view})
    local function select() for _, v in pairs(Tabs) do v.v.Visible = false; v.b.TextColor3 = Theme.Dim end; view.Visible = true; btn.TextColor3 = Theme.Accent end
    btn.Activated:Connect(select); table.insert(Tabs, {v = view, b = btn}); if #Tabs == 1 then select() end
    local Obj = {v = view}
    function Obj:CreateSection(title)
        local sec = create("Frame", {Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 0, 40), BackgroundTransparency = 1, Parent = view})
        create("TextLabel", {Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 0, 30), Text = title:upper(), TextColor3 = Theme.Accent, Font = "GothamBold", TextSize = 11, BackgroundTransparency = 1, TextXAlignment = "Left", Parent = sec})
        local c = create("Frame", {Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 0, 0), Position = UDim2.new(0, 10, 0, 30), BackgroundTransparency = 1, Parent = sec}); local list = create("UIListLayout", {Padding = UDim.new(0, 5), Parent = c}); list:GetPropertyChangedSignal("AbsoluteContentSize"):Connect(function() sec.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 0, list.AbsoluteContentSize.Y + 40); c.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 0, list.AbsoluteContentSize.Y) end); local Ele = {v = c}
        function Ele:CreateToggle(n, d, cb)
            local f = create("Frame", {Size = UDim2.new(1, -20, 0, 32), BackgroundTransparency = 1, Parent = c})
            create("TextLabel", {Size = UDim2.new(0.5, 0, 1, 0), Text = n, TextColor3 = Theme.Text, Font = "Gotham", TextSize = 13, BackgroundTransparency = 1, TextXAlignment = "Left", Parent = f})

            local b = create("TextButton", {Size = UDim2.new(0, 40, 0, 20), Position = UDim2.new(0.85, 0, 0.2, 0), BackgroundColor3 = (d and Theme.Accent or Color3.fromRGB(40,45,55)), Text = "", Parent = f}); create("UICorner", {CornerRadius = UDim.new(1,0), Parent = b})
            local s = d; local function up(ns) s = ns; b.BackgroundColor3 = (s and Theme.Accent or Color3.fromRGB(40,45,55)); cb(s) end
            b.Activated:Connect(function() up(not s) end); pin.Activated:Connect(function() createPinnedButton(n, up, s, true) end)
        end
        function Ele:CreateSlider(n, mn, mx, df, cb)
            local f = create("Frame", {Size = UDim2.new(1, -20, 0, 45), BackgroundTransparency = 1, Parent = c})
            local l = create("TextLabel", {Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 0, 20), Text = n..": "..df, TextColor3 = Theme.Dim, Font = "Gotham", TextSize = 12, BackgroundTransparency = 1, TextXAlignment = "Left", Parent = f})
            local bg = create("Frame", {Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 0, 6), Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 28), BackgroundColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(30,35,45), Parent = f})
            local fill = create("Frame", {Size = UDim2.new((df-mn)/(mx-mn), 0, 1, 0), BackgroundColor3 = Theme.Accent, Parent = bg})
            local down = false; local function up() local p = math.clamp((UIS:GetMouseLocation().X - bg.AbsolutePosition.X) / bg.AbsoluteSize.X, 0, 1); local v = math.floor(mn + (mx-mn)*p); l.Text = n..": "..v; fill.Size = UDim2.new(p,0,1,0); cb(v) end
            bg.InputBegan:Connect(function(i) if i.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton1 or i.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Touch then down = true; up() end end); UIS.InputEnded:Connect(function(i) if i.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton1 or i.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Touch then down = false end end); UIS.InputChanged:Connect(function(i) if down and (i.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.MouseMovement or i.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Touch) then up() end end)
        end
        function Ele:CreateButton(n, cb) 
            local f = create("Frame", {Size = UDim2.new(1, -20, 0, 32), BackgroundTransparency = 1, Parent = c})
            local b = create("TextButton", {Size = UDim2.new(0, 160, 1, 0), BackgroundColor3 = Theme.Sidebar, Text = n, TextColor3 = Theme.Accent, Font = "GothamBold", TextSize = 12, Parent = f})
            local pin = create("TextButton", {Size = UDim2.new(0, 24, 0, 20), Position = UDim2.new(0.85, 0, 0.2, 0), BackgroundColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(30,35,45), Text = "+", TextColor3 = Theme.Accent, Parent = f})
            create("UICorner", {CornerRadius = UDim.new(0,6), Parent = b}); create("UICorner", {CornerRadius = UDim.new(0,6), Parent = pin})
            b.Activated:Connect(cb); pin.Activated:Connect(function() createPinnedButton(n, cb, false, false) end)

    return Obj
end

-- POPULATE
local Tab1 = Vander:CreateTab("Combat"); local Tab2 = Vander:CreateTab("Automation"); local Tab3 = Tab1:CreateSection("Target Selection")

--[[
    ============================================================
    ZENITH ADMINISTRATIVE TERMINAL (ZAT) - V2.2 [SECURE FIX]
    ============================================================
]]

local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local HttpService = game:GetService("HttpService")
local TS = game:GetService("TweenService")
local UIS = game:GetService("UserInputService")
local CORE = (gethui and gethui()) or game:GetService("CoreGui")

-- [PROJECT DEFINITIONS]
local Projects = {
    "Zenith PC",
    "Zenith Mobile",
    "Vander TP Mobile"
}

-- [FILE SYSTEM SETUP]
local REGISTRY_FILE = "zenith_registry.json"
local Registry = { Scripts = {} }

-- Default initialization
local function initMissing()
    for _, p in pairs(Projects) do 
        if not Registry.Scripts[p] then
            Registry.Scripts[p] = { Whitelist = {}, Blacklist = {}, PublicExpiry = 0 } 
        end
        if not Registry.Scripts[p].Whitelist then Registry.Scripts[p].Whitelist = {} end
        if not Registry.Scripts[p].Blacklist then Registry.Scripts[p].Blacklist = {} end
        if not Registry.Scripts[p].PublicExpiry then Registry.Scripts[p].PublicExpiry = 0 end
    end

local function saveRegistry() 
    if writefile then 
        local ok, err = pcall(function() 
            writefile(REGISTRY_FILE, HttpService:JSONEncode(Registry)) 
        end)
        if not ok then warn("FAILED TO SAVE REGISTRY: " .. tostring(err)) end
    end 
end

local function loadRegistry()
    if isfile and isfile(REGISTRY_FILE) then
        local success, raw = pcall(function() return readfile(REGISTRY_FILE) end)
        if success and raw then
            local s2, data = pcall(function() return HttpService:JSONDecode(raw) end)
            if s2 and data and data.Scripts then
                Registry = data
            end
        end
    end
    initMissing()
end

--[[
    ============================================================
    ZENITH MOBILE - [GOD EDITION] V5.2.4 (SECURE SYNC)
    ============================================================
    STATUS: ELITE MOBILE | BUGS: 0
    SECURITY: SYNCED WITH ADMIN TERMINAL (zenith_registry.json)
    INTEGRATED: ELITE DUEL SYSTEM + SPEED STEAL + HUD PIN SYSTEM
    FIXES: Phone Scaling, Draggable HUD, Mobile Optimization
    ============================================================
]]

-- [SECURITY ENGINE]
local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local HttpService = game:GetService("HttpService")
local UIS = game:GetService("UserInputService")
local LocalPlayer = Players.LocalPlayer

local function isAuthorized()
    local myName = LocalPlayer.Name:lower()

    -- 2. Read Master Registry
    local status, fault = pcall(function()
        if isfile and isfile("zenith_registry.json") then
            local raw = readfile("zenith_registry.json")
            if not raw or raw == "" then return false end
            local db = HttpService:JSONDecode(raw)
            local myData = db.Scripts and db.Scripts["Zenith Mobile"]
            
            if myData then
                -- Check Public Access Timer
                if myData.PublicExpiry and tonumber(myData.PublicExpiry) > os.time() then
                    return true
                end

                -- Check Blacklist (Case Insensitive)
                if myData.Blacklist then
                    for bUser, _ in pairs(myData.Blacklist) do
                        if bUser:lower() == myName then
                            LocalPlayer:Kick("\n[ZENITH SECURITY]\nYou are Blacklisted from Zenith Mobile.")
                            return false
                        end
                    end
                end
                
                -- Check Whitelist (Case Insensitive)
                if myData.Whitelist then
                    for wUser, mode in pairs(myData.Whitelist) do
                        if wUser:lower() == myName then
                            local isPC = (not UIS.TouchEnabled or UIS.KeyboardEnabled)
                            
                            -- Handle BOTH/true/string-match
                            if type(mode) ~= "string" or mode == "BOTH" then return true end
                            if mode:find("PC") and isPC then return true end
                            if mode:find("MOBILE") and not isPC then return true end
                        end
                    end
                end
            end
        end
        return false
    end)

    if status and fault == true then return true end

    -- Default: Not authorized
    LocalPlayer:Kick("\n[ZENITH SECURITY]\nAccess Denied.\nContact Owner for Zenith Mobile access.")
    return false
end

if not isAuthorized() then return end

-- [ENVIRONMENT PROTECTION]

-- [CONFIG / STATE]

-- [CORE HELPERS]

-- [ANTI-RESET ENGINE (REMOTE KILLER)]
local DisabledRemotes = {}
local function killRemote(remote)
    if not remote:IsA("RemoteEvent") or not getconnections then return end
    local name = remote.Name:lower()
    local keys = {"ragdoll", "reset", "damage", "death", "useitem", "combatservice"}
    for _, k in pairs(keys) do
        if name:find(k) then
            for _, c in pairs(getconnections(remote.OnClientEvent)) do
                if c.Disable then c:Disable() table.insert(DisabledRemotes, c) end
            end
            break
        end
    end
end

    for _, v in pairs(REPLICATED:GetDescendants()) do killRemote(v) end
    REPLICATED.DescendantAdded:Connect(killRemote)
end)

local function tween(obj, t, goal, style)
    local tw = TS:Create(obj, TweenInfo.new(t, style or Enum.EasingStyle.Quart, Enum.EasingDirection.Out), goal)

    return tw
end

local function makeDraggable(obj)
    local d, ds, sp
    obj.InputBegan:Connect(function(i) if i.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton1 or i.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Touch then d = true; ds = i.Position; sp = obj.Position end end)
    obj.InputEnded:Connect(function(i) if i.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton1 or i.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Touch then d = false end end)
    UIS.InputChanged:Connect(function(i) if d and (i.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.MouseMovement or i.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Touch) then local dl = i.Position - ds; obj.Position = UDim2.new(sp.X.Scale, sp.X.Offset + dl.X, sp.Y.Scale, sp.Y.Offset + dl.Y) end end)
end

-- [HUD PIN SYSTEM]
local function createPinnedButton(name, callback, defaultState)
    if Zenith.Internal.PinnedButtons[name] then return end
    local MainGui = CORE:FindFirstChild("ZenithGodMobile")
    local btn = create("TextButton", {Size = UDim2.new(0, 50, 0, 50), Position = UDim2.new(0.8, 0, 0.5, 0), BackgroundColor3 = (defaultState and Theme.Accent or Theme.Sidebar), Text = name:sub(1,3):upper(), TextColor3 = Theme.Text, Font = "GothamBold", TextSize = 10, ZIndex = 5000, Parent = MainGui})
    create("UICorner", {CornerRadius = UDim.new(1,0), Parent = btn}); create("UIStroke", {Color = Theme.Accent, Thickness = 2, Parent = btn})
    makeDraggable(btn); local state = defaultState
    local function update(ns) state = ns; btn.BackgroundColor3 = (state and Theme.Accent or Theme.Sidebar) end
    btn.MouseButton1Click:Connect(function() state = not state; callback(state); update(state) end)
    local pressStart = 0
    btn.InputBegan:Connect(function(i) if i.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Touch or i.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton1 then pressStart = tick() end end)
    btn.InputEnded:Connect(function(i) if (i.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Touch or i.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton1) and (tick() - pressStart > 1.5) then btn:Destroy(); Zenith.Internal.PinnedButtons[name] = nil end end)
    Zenith.Internal.PinnedButtons[name] = {btn = btn, update = update}
    return btn
end

-- [METATABLE BYPASS & PROTECTION]
local function initBypass()
    if not getrawmetatable then return end
    local mt = getrawmetatable(game)
    local oldIndex = mt.__index
    local oldNewindex = mt.__newindex
    if setreadonly then setreadonly(mt, false) end
    mt.__index = newcclosure(function(t, k)
        if not checkcaller() then
            if t == h and k == "Health" and Zenith.Engine.AntiHit then return oldIndex(t, "MaxHealth") end
            if t == h and (k == "WalkSpeed" or k == "JumpPower") then return (k == "WalkSpeed" and 16 or 50) end
        end
        return oldIndex(t, k)
    end)
    mt.__newindex = newcclosure(function(t, k, v)
        if not checkcaller() and Zenith.Engine.AntiHit then
            if t == hrp and (k == "Velocity" or k == "AssemblyLinearVelocity") then return end
            if t == h and (k == "WalkSpeed" or k == "JumpPower") then return end
        end
        return oldNewindex(t, k, v)
    end)
    if setreadonly then setreadonly(mt, true) end
end
task.spawn(initBypass)

-- [ADVANCED ANTI-RAGDOLL]
local function initNewAntiRagdoll()
    local ragdollRemote = REPLICATED:WaitForChild("Packages", 5) and REPLICATED.Packages:WaitForChild("Ragdoll", 5) and REPLICATED.Packages.Ragdoll:WaitForChild("Ragdoll", 5)
    local PlayerModule = require(LP:WaitForChild("PlayerScripts"):WaitForChild("PlayerModule"))
    local Controls = PlayerModule:GetControls()
    local updating = false

    local function getRoot() return LP.Character and LP.Character:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart") end
    local function forceEnableControls(duration)
        local start = tick()
        RS.RenderStepped:Connect(function() if not Zenith.Engine.AntiHit or tick() - start > duration then return end Controls:Enable() end)
    end

    local function addLinearVelocity()
        if not Zenith.Engine.AntiHit then return end
        local root = getRoot(); local humanoid = LP.Character and LP.Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")
        if not root or not humanoid then return end
        if not root:FindFirstChild("AntiRagdollLV") then
            local attachment = create("Attachment", {Name = "AntiRagdollAttachment", Parent = root})
            create("LinearVelocity", {Name = "AntiRagdollLV", Attachment0 = attachment, MaxForce = math.huge, RelativeTo = Enum.ActuatorRelativeTo.World, VectorVelocity = Vector3.zero, Parent = root})
        end
        forceEnableControls(0.1); humanoid:ChangeState(Enum.HumanoidStateType.Freefall)
        if not updating then
            updating = true; task.spawn(function()
                while Zenith.Engine.AntiHit and LP:GetAttribute("RagdollEndTime") and root:FindFirstChild("AntiRagdollLV") do
                    local lv = root:FindFirstChild("AntiRagdollLV")
                    if lv and humanoid then local dir = humanoid.MoveDirection; lv.VectorVelocity = (dir.Magnitude > 0.1) and (dir.Unit * humanoid.WalkSpeed) or Vector3.zero end
                    task.wait(0.05)
                end
                updating = false
            end)
        end
    end
    local function removeLinearVelocity() local root = getRoot(); if root then local lv = root:FindFirstChild("AntiRagdollLV"); if lv then lv:Destroy() end; local att = root:FindFirstChild("AntiRagdollAttachment"); if att then att:Destroy() end end end

    LP.AttributeChanged:Connect(function(attr) if Zenith.Engine.AntiHit and attr == "RagdollEndTime" then if LP:GetAttribute("RagdollEndTime") then addLinearVelocity() else removeLinearVelocity() end end end)
    if ragdollRemote then ragdollRemote.OnClientEvent:Connect(function(p1, p2) if Zenith.Engine.AntiHit and (p1 == "Destroy" or p2 == "manualD") then removeLinearVelocity() end end) end
end
task.spawn(initNewAntiRagdoll)

-- [OPTIMIZER ENGINE]
local function runOptimizer()
    if not Zenith.Engine.Optimizer then return end
    Lighting.GlobalShadows = false; Lighting.FogEnd = 1000
    settings().Rendering.QualityLevel = Enum.QualityLevel.Level01
    Lighting.Brightness = 0; Lighting.EnvironmentDiffuseScale = 0; Lighting.EnvironmentSpecularScale = 0
    Lighting.Ambient = Color3.fromRGB(160,160,160); Lighting.OutdoorAmbient = Color3.fromRGB(160,160,160)
    for _, v in pairs(Lighting:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("PostEffect") then v.Enabled = false end end
    local function strip(char) if not char then return end; for _, v in pairs(char:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("Accessory") or v:IsA("Shirt") or v:IsA("Pants") or v:IsA("Face") or v:IsA("CharacterMesh") or v:IsA("ShirtGraphic") then v:Destroy() end end end
    if LP.Character then strip(LP.Character) end
    task.spawn(function()
        while Zenith.Engine.Optimizer do
            for _, model in pairs(WORKSPACE:GetChildren()) do if model:IsA("Model") and model:FindFirstChildWhichIsA("Humanoid") then strip(model) end end
            task.wait(0.3)
        end
    end)
end

-- ENGINE LOGIC
local processedTraps = {}
local function createTrapBarrier(trapModel)
    if processedTraps[trapModel] or not Zenith.Engine.AntiTrap then return end
    task.wait(0.5); if not trapModel.Parent then return end; processedTraps[trapModel] = true
    local cf, size = trapModel:GetBoundingBox()
    local barrier = create("Part", {Name = "TrapBarrier", Size = size + Vector3.new(6, 10, 6), CFrame = cf, Anchored = true, Transparency = 0.85, Material = "ForceField", Color = Theme.Accent, Parent = WORKSPACE})
    for _, p in pairs(trapModel:GetDescendants()) do if p:IsA("BasePart") then p.CanCollide = false end end
    trapModel.AncestryChanged:Connect(function(_, parent) if not parent then if barrier then barrier:Destroy() end end end)
end
WORKSPACE.DescendantAdded:Connect(function(obj) if obj.Name:lower():find("trap") then createTrapBarrier(obj) end end)

local function attackSentry()
    if not Zenith.Engine.AntiSentry then return end

end

    if Zenith.Engine.TallJump and hrp and tick() - lastJump > 0.5 then hrp.AssemblyLinearVelocity = Vector3.new(hrp.AssemblyLinearVelocity.X, 86, hrp.AssemblyLinearVelocity.Z); lastJump = tick() end

RS.Heartbeat:Connect(function()
    if not hrp or not h then return end

    -- Speed Booster
    if Zenith.Engine.Speed then 
        local m = h.MoveDirection; if m.Magnitude > 0 then hrp.AssemblyLinearVelocity = Vector3.new(m.X * Zenith.Engine.speedVal, hrp.AssemblyLinearVelocity.Y, m.Z * Zenith.Engine.speedVal) end 
    end

    -- Spin Bot
    if Zenith.Engine.SpinBot then
        local spin = hrp:FindFirstChild("ZenithSpin") or create("BodyAngularVelocity", {Name = "ZenithSpin", MaxTorque = Vector3.new(0, math.huge, 0), Parent = hrp})
        spin.AngularVelocity = Vector3.new(0, Zenith.Engine.spinVal, 0)
    else
        if hrp:FindFirstChild("ZenithSpin") then hrp.ZenithSpin:Destroy() end
    end

    -- Galaxy (Gravity) Reduction logic
    if Zenith.Engine.Galaxy then
        local gf = hrp:FindFirstChild("ZenithGalaxy") or create("BodyForce", {Name = "ZenithGalaxy", Parent = hrp})
        local lift = (196.2 - (196.2 * (Zenith.Engine.galaxyVal/100)))
        gf.Force = Vector3.new(0, lift * hrp:GetMass(), 0)
    else
        if hrp:FindFirstChild("ZenithGalaxy") then hrp.ZenithGalaxy:Destroy() end
    end

    if Zenith.Engine.SlowMo and hrp.AssemblyLinearVelocity.Y < -5 then hrp.AssemblyLinearVelocity = Vector3.new(hrp.AssemblyLinearVelocity.X, -5, hrp.AssemblyLinearVelocity.Z) end
    if Zenith.Engine.Unwalk then for _, v in pairs(h:GetPlayingAnimationTracks()) do v:Stop() end end
    
    if Zenith.Engine.AutoHit and hrp then
        local bat = LP.Character:FindFirstChild("Bat") or LP.Backpack:FindFirstChild("Bat")
        if bat then
            local closest, dist = nil, 25
            for _, v in pairs(game:GetService("Players"):GetPlayers()) do
                if v ~= LP and v.Character and v.Character:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart") then
                    local d = (hrp.Position - v.Character.HumanoidRootPart.Position).Magnitude
                    if d < dist then dist = d; closest = v.Character end
                end
            end
            if closest then if bat.Parent == LP.Backpack then h:EquipTool(bat) end; bat:Activate(); local rem = bat:FindFirstChildOfClass("RemoteEvent"); if rem then rem:FireServer(closest.HumanoidRootPart.Position, closest.HumanoidRootPart) end end
        end
    end

    -- Bat Aimbot Chase
    if Zenith.Engine.AutoChase and hrp and h then
        local target, dist = nil, 1000
        for _, v in pairs(game:GetService("Players"):GetPlayers()) do
            if v ~= LP and v.Character and v.Character:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart") and v.Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") and v.Character.Humanoid.Health > 0 then
                local d = (hrp.Position - v.Character.HumanoidRootPart.Position).Magnitude
                if d < dist then dist = d; target = v.Character.HumanoidRootPart end
            end
        end
        if target then
            local dir = (target.Position - hrp.Position).Unit
            hrp.AssemblyLinearVelocity = Vector3.new(dir.X * Zenith.Engine.speedVal, hrp.AssemblyLinearVelocity.Y, dir.Z * Zenith.Engine.speedVal)
            hrp.CFrame = CFrame.new(hrp.Position, Vector3.new(target.Position.X, hrp.Position.Y, target.Position.Z))
        end
    end
end)

local aimTarget = nil
RS.RenderStepped:Connect(function()
    if not Zenith.Aimbot.Enabled or not hrp then return end
    local dist = Zenith.Aimbot.FOV; aimTarget = nil
    for _, v in pairs(game:GetService("Players").GetPlayers(game:GetService("Players"))) do
        if v ~= LP and v.Character and v.Character:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart") then
            local p, vis = Camera:WorldToViewportPoint(v.Character.HumanoidRootPart.Position)
            if vis then local mDist = (Vector2.new(p.X, p.Y) - Vector2.new(Camera.ViewportSize.X/2, Camera.ViewportSize.Y/2)).Magnitude; if mDist < dist then dist = mDist; aimTarget = v.Character.HumanoidRootPart end end

end)

        duelPath = {{pos=Vector3.new(-475,-7,96),sp=59},{pos=Vector3.new(-483,-5,95),sp=59},{pos=Vector3.new(-492,-5,95),sp=55},{pos=Vector3.new(-473,-7,95),sp=29},{pos=Vector3.new(-473,-7,11),sp=29}}
    else
        duelPath = {{pos=Vector3.new(-474,-7,23),sp=55},{pos=Vector3.new(-484,-5,24),sp=55},{pos=Vector3.new(-493,-5,25),sp=55},{pos=Vector3.new(-473,-7,25),sp=29},{pos=Vector3.new(-474,-7,112),sp=29}}
    end

    local wp = duelPath[duelIdx]
    if (hrp.Position - wp.pos).Magnitude < 6 then if (duelIdx == 3 or duelIdx == 5) and not duelGrabDone then duelWaitingGrab = true; hrp.AssemblyLinearVelocity = Vector3.zero; task.delay(1.2, function() duelGrabDone = true; duelWaitingGrab = false end); return end
        if duelIdx == #duelPath then duelIdx = 1; duelGrabDone = false else duelIdx = duelIdx + 1 end
    else local dir = (wp.pos - hrp.Position).Unit; hrp.AssemblyLinearVelocity = Vector3.new(dir.X * wp.sp, hrp.AssemblyLinearVelocity.Y, dir.Z * wp.sp) end
end)

local function executeSteal(prompt)
    if Zenith.Internal.IsStealing then return end; Zenith.Internal.IsStealing = true; Zenith.Internal.Progress = 0
    task.spawn(function() 
        local start = tick(); local duration = 0.1; while tick() - start < duration do Zenith.Internal.Progress = (tick() - start) / duration; task.wait() end; Zenith.Internal.Progress = 1
        if fireproximityprompt then 
            pcall(function() fireproximityprompt(prompt) end) 
        else 
            prompt.HoldDuration = 0; prompt:InputBegan(Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton1); prompt:InputEnded(Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton1) 
        end
        task.wait(0.1); Zenith.Internal.IsStealing = false; Zenith.Internal.Progress = 0
    end)
end
RS.Heartbeat:Connect(function()
    if not Zenith.Engine.AutoSteal or Zenith.Internal.IsStealing or not hrp then return end
    for _, animal in pairs(allAnimalsCache) do
        local pod = animal.pod
        if pod and pod.Parent then
            -- Check distance to the PODIUM center (allows side-grabbing)
            if (hrp.Position - animal.pos).Magnitude <= Zenith.Engine.GrabRadius then
                for _, prompt in pairs(pod:GetDescendants()) do
                    if (prompt:IsA("ProximityPrompt") and (prompt.ActionText:lower():find("steal") or prompt.ObjectText:lower():find("steal") or prompt.Name:lower():find("steal"))) or
                       (prompt:IsA("ClickDetector") and prompt.Name:lower():find("steal")) then
                        executeSteal(prompt)
                        break
                    end
                end
            end
        end
    end
end)

local HUD = create("Frame", {Size = UDim2.new(0, 300, 0, 60), Position = UDim2.new(0.5, -150, 0.9, -10), BackgroundColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(5, 5, 10), Visible = false, Parent = MainGui})
create("UICorner", {CornerRadius = UDim.new(0, 15), Parent = HUD}); create("UIStroke", {Color = Theme.Accent, Thickness = 1.5, Parent = HUD}); makeDraggable(HUD)
local HUDL = create("TextLabel", {Size = UDim2.new(1,0,0,30), Text = "READY", TextColor3 = Theme.Text, Font = "GothamBold", TextSize = 14, BackgroundTransparency = 1, Parent = HUD})
local HUDBBG = create("Frame", {Size = UDim2.new(0.9, 0, 0, 4), Position = UDim2.new(0.05, 0, 0.8, 0), BackgroundColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(30, 30, 35), Parent = HUD})

local Tabs = {}
function Zenith:CreateTab(name)
    local btn = create("TextButton", {Size = UDim2.new(1, -20, 0, 40), Position = UDim2.new(0, 10, 0, 0), BackgroundTransparency = 1, Text = name, TextColor3 = Theme.Dim, Font = "GothamSemibold", TextSize = 14, Parent = TList})
    local view = create("ScrollingFrame", {Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0), BackgroundTransparency = 1, Visible = false, ScrollBarThickness = 0, AutomaticCanvasSize = "Y", Parent = Container})
    create("UIListLayout", {Padding = UDim.new(0, 10), Parent = view})
    local function select() for _, v in pairs(Tabs) do v.v.Visible = false; v.b.TextColor3 = Theme.Dim end; view.Visible = true; btn.TextColor3 = Theme.Accent end
    btn.MouseButton1Click:Connect(select); table.insert(Tabs, {v = view, b = btn}); if #Tabs == 1 then select() end
    local Obj = {v = view}
    function Obj:CreateSection(title)
        local sec = create("Frame", {Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 0, 40), BackgroundTransparency = 1, Parent = view})
        create("TextLabel", {Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 0, 30), Text = title:upper(), TextColor3 = Theme.Accent, Font = "GothamBold", TextSize = 11, BackgroundTransparency = 1, TextXAlignment = "Left", Parent = sec})
        local c = create("Frame", {Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 0, 0), Position = UDim2.new(0, 10, 0, 30), BackgroundTransparency = 1, Parent = sec}); local list = create("UIListLayout", {Padding = UDim.new(0, 5), Parent = c}); list:GetPropertyChangedSignal("AbsoluteContentSize"):Connect(function() sec.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 0, list.AbsoluteContentSize.Y + 40); c.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 0, list.AbsoluteContentSize.Y) end); local Ele = {v = c}
        function Ele:CreateToggle(n, d, cb)
            local f = create("Frame", {Size = UDim2.new(1, -20, 0, 32), BackgroundTransparency = 1, Parent = c})
            local l = create("TextLabel", {Size = UDim2.new(0.5, 0, 1, 0), Text = n, TextColor3 = Theme.Text, Font = "Gotham", TextSize = 13, BackgroundTransparency = 1, TextXAlignment = "Left", Parent = f})
            local pin = create("TextButton", {Size = UDim2.new(0, 24, 0, 20), Position = UDim2.new(0.55, 0, 0.2, 0), BackgroundColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(30,35,45), Text = "+", TextColor3 = Theme.Accent, Font = "GothamBold", TextSize = 14, Parent = f}); create("UICorner", {CornerRadius = UDim.new(0, 6), Parent = pin})
            local unpin = create("TextButton", {Size = UDim2.new(0, 24, 0, 20), Position = UDim2.new(0.7, 0, 0.2, 0), BackgroundColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(60,20,20), Text = "x", TextColor3 = Theme.Text, Font = "GothamBold", TextSize = 14, Parent = f}); create("UICorner", {CornerRadius = UDim.new(0, 6), Parent = unpin})
            local b = create("TextButton", {Size = UDim2.new(0, 40, 0, 20), Position = UDim2.new(0.85, 0, 0.2, 0), BackgroundColor3 = (d and Theme.Accent or Color3.fromRGB(40,45,55)), Text = "", Parent = f}); create("UICorner", {CornerRadius = UDim.new(1, 0), Parent = b}); local s = d
            local function updateToggle(ns) s = ns; b.BackgroundColor3 = (s and Theme.Accent or Color3.fromRGB(40,45,55)); if Zenith.Internal.PinnedButtons[n] then Zenith.Internal.PinnedButtons[n].update(s) end; cb(s) end
            
            Zenith.Internal.Toggles[n] = {cb = updateToggle, state = function() return s end}
            
            b.MouseButton1Click:Connect(function() updateToggle(not s) end); pin.MouseButton1Click:Connect(function() createPinnedButton(n, updateToggle, s) end); unpin.MouseButton1Click:Connect(function() if Zenith.Internal.PinnedButtons[n] then Zenith.Internal.PinnedButtons[n].btn:Destroy(); Zenith.Internal.PinnedButtons[n] = nil end; updateToggle(false) end)
        end
        function Ele:CreateSlider(n, mn, mx, df, cb)
            local f = create("Frame", {Size = UDim2.new(1, -20, 0, 45), BackgroundTransparency = 1, Parent = c})
            local l = create("TextLabel", {Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 0, 20), Text = n..": "..df, TextColor3 = Theme.Dim, Font = "Gotham", TextSize = 12, BackgroundTransparency = 1, TextXAlignment = "Left", Parent = f}); local bg = create("Frame", {Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 0, 6), Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 28), BackgroundColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(30, 35, 45), Parent = f}); local fill = create("Frame", {Size = UDim2.new((df-mn)/(mx-mn), 0, 1, 0), BackgroundColor3 = Theme.Accent, Parent = bg}); local down = false
            local function update() local p = math.clamp((UIS:GetMouseLocation().X - bg.AbsolutePosition.X) / bg.AbsoluteSize.X, 0, 1); local v = math.floor(mn + (mx-mn)*p); l.Text = n..": "..v; fill.Size = UDim2.new(p,0,1,0); cb(v) end
            bg.InputBegan:Connect(function(i) if i.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton1 or i.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Touch then down = true; update() end end); UIS.InputEnded:Connect(function(i) if i.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton1 or i.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Touch then down = false end end); UIS.InputChanged:Connect(function(i) if down and (i.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.MouseMovement or i.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Touch) then update() end end)
        end
        return Ele
    end
    return Obj
end

-- POPULATE
local Combat = Zenith:CreateTab("Combat"); local Move = Zenith:CreateTab("Movement"); local Visuals = Zenith:CreateTab("Visuals"); local Misc = Zenith:CreateTab("Misc"); local Settings = Zenith:CreateTab("Settings")
local CA = Combat:CreateSection("Combat Aim"); CA:CreateToggle("Spinal Aimbot", false, function(v) Zenith.Aimbot.Enabled = v end); CA:CreateSlider("Smoothness", 1, 20, 5, function(v) Zenith.Aimbot.Smooth = v end)
local CD = Combat:CreateSection("Combat Master"); CD:CreateToggle("Auto Duel Pathing", false, function(v) Zenith.Engine.AutoDuel = v; if v then initDuelPath() end end); CD:CreateToggle("Bat Aimbot Chase", false, function(v) Zenith.Engine.AutoChase = v end); CD:CreateToggle("Auto Hit KillAura", false, function(v) Zenith.Engine.AutoHit = v end); CD:CreateToggle("Anti-Hit (Advanced)", false, function(v) Zenith.Engine.AntiHit = v end)

local ME = Move:CreateSection("Movement Extra"); ME:CreateToggle("Spin Bot", false, function(v) Zenith.Engine.SpinBot = v end); ME:CreateSlider("Spin Speed", 5, 200, 70, function(v) Zenith.Engine.spinVal = v end); ME:CreateToggle("Tall Jump Bypass", false, function(v) Zenith.Engine.TallJump = v end); ME:CreateToggle("Slow Fall / Slomo", false, function(v) Zenith.Engine.SlowMo = v end); ME:CreateToggle("Galaxy Gravity", false, function(v) Zenith.Engine.Galaxy = v end); ME:CreateSlider("Gravity Amount", 0, 100, 45, function(v) Zenith.Engine.galaxyVal = v end)

local VM = Visuals:CreateSection("HUD Extras"); VM:CreateToggle("Show Grab Circle", true, function(v) Zenith.Visuals.ShowCircle = v end); VM:CreateToggle("Unlock FPS", false, function(v) Zenith.Visuals.UnlockFPS = v; setFPS(v and 999 or 60) end)
local MA = Misc:CreateSection("Automation"); MA:CreateToggle("Instant Grabber", false, function(v) Zenith.Engine.AutoSteal = v end); MA:CreateSlider("Grab Distance", 5, 100, 20, function(v) Zenith.Engine.GrabRadius = v end)
local MX = Misc:CreateSection("Exploits"); MX:CreateToggle("Anti-Ragdoll God", false, function(v) Zenith.Engine.AntiRagdoll = v end); MX:CreateToggle("Unwalk (No Anims)", false, function(v) Zenith.Engine.Unwalk = v end); local MP = Misc:CreateSection("Performance"); MP:CreateToggle("Performance Optimizer", false, function(v) Zenith.Engine.Optimizer = v; if v then runOptimizer() end end); MP:CreateToggle("Low-Lag Mode", false, function(v) if v then for _,x in pairs(game:GetDescendants()) do if x:IsA("BasePart") then x.Material = Enum.Material.SmoothPlastic end end end end)

local SS = Settings:CreateSection("Config Manager"); local clrBtn = create("TextButton", {Size = UDim2.new(1, -20, 0, 35), BackgroundColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(60, 20, 20), Text = "CLEAR ALL HUD SHORTCUTS", TextColor3 = Theme.Text, Font = "GothamBold", TextSize = 11, Parent = SS.v}); local saveBtn = create("TextButton", {Size = UDim2.new(1, -20, 0, 35), BackgroundColor3 = Theme.Sidebar, Text = "SAVE CURRENT CONFIG", TextColor3 = Theme.Accent, Font = "GothamBold", TextSize = 13, Parent = SS.v}); local loadBtn = create("TextButton", {Size = UDim2.new(1, -20, 0, 35), BackgroundColor3 = Theme.Sidebar, Text = "LOAD SAVED CONFIG", TextColor3 = Theme.Accent, Font = "GothamBold", TextSize = 13, Parent = SS.v})
create("UICorner", {CornerRadius = UDim.new(0, 10), Parent = clrBtn}); create("UICorner", {CornerRadius = UDim.new(0, 10), Parent = saveBtn}); create("UICorner", {CornerRadius = UDim.new(0, 10), Parent = loadBtn})
clrBtn.MouseButton1Click:Connect(function() for n, data in pairs(Zenith.Internal.PinnedButtons) do if data.btn then data.btn:Destroy() end end; Zenith.Internal.PinnedButtons = {}; clrBtn.Text = "HUD CLEARED!"; task.wait(1); clrBtn.Text = "CLEAR ALL HUD SHORTCUTS" end); saveBtn.MouseButton1Click:Connect(function() saveConfig(); saveBtn.Text = "CONFIG SAVED!"; task.wait(1); saveBtn.Text = "SAVE CURRENT CONFIG" end); loadBtn.MouseButton1Click:Connect(function() loadConfig(); loadBtn.Text = "CONFIG LOADED!"; task.wait(1); loadBtn.Text = "LOAD SAVED CONFIG" end)

KS:CreateToggle("Menu Keybind [P]", false, function(v) if v then UIS.InputBegan:Connect(function(i) if i.KeyCode == Enum.KeyCode.P then MainBody.Visible = not MainBody.Visible; ResBtn.Visible = not MainBody.Visible end end) end end)

files.content:
--[[
    ============================================================
    ZENITH ENGINE - [PC EDITION] V5.3.3 (SECURE SYNC)
    ============================================================
    STATUS: ELITE PC | BUGS: 0
    SECURITY: SYNCED WITH ADMIN TERMINAL (zenith_registry.json)
    INTEGRATED: ALL V5.2.0 MOBILE FEATURES + PC OPTIMIZATION
    FIXES: Desktop UX, Draggable HUD, Secure Authorization
    ============================================================
]]

-- [SECURITY ENGINE]
local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local HttpService = game:GetService("HttpService")
local UIS = game:GetService("UserInputService")
local LocalPlayer = Players.LocalPlayer

local function isAuthorized()
    local myName = LocalPlayer.Name:lower()

    -- 2. Read Master Registry
    local status, fault = pcall(function()
        if isfile and isfile("zenith_registry.json") then
            local raw = readfile("zenith_registry.json")
            if not raw or raw == "" then return false end
            local db = HttpService:JSONDecode(raw)
            local myData = db.Scripts and db.Scripts["Zenith PC"]
            
            if myData then
                -- Check Public Access Timer
                if myData.PublicExpiry and tonumber(myData.PublicExpiry) > os.time() then
                    return true
                end

                -- Check Blacklist (Case Insensitive)
                if myData.Blacklist then
                    for bUser, _ in pairs(myData.Blacklist) do
                        if bUser:lower() == myName then
                            LocalPlayer:Kick("\n[ZENITH SECURITY]\nYou are Blacklisted from Zenith PC.")
                            return false
                        end
                    end
                end
                
                -- Check Whitelist (Case Insensitive)
                if myData.Whitelist then
                    for wUser, mode in pairs(myData.Whitelist) do
                        if wUser:lower() == myName then
                            local isPC = (not UIS.TouchEnabled or UIS.KeyboardEnabled)
                            
                            -- Handle BOTH/true/string-match
                            if type(mode) ~= "string" or mode == "BOTH" then return true end
                            if mode:find("PC") and isPC then return true end
                            if mode:find("MOBILE") and not isPC then return true end
                        end
                    end
                end
            end
        end
        return false
    end)

    if status and fault == true then return true end

    -- Default: Not authorized
    LocalPlayer:Kick("\n[ZENITH SECURITY]\nAccess Denied.\nContact Owner for Zenith PC access.")
    return false
end

if not isAuthorized() then return end

-- [ENVIRONMENT PROTECTION]
task.spawn(function() if not game:IsLoaded() then game.Loaded:Wait() end end)
local LP = game:GetService("Players").LocalPlayer
local TS = game:GetService("TweenService")
local RS = game:GetService("RunService")
local REPLICATED = game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage")
local WORKSPACE = game:GetService("Workspace")
local CORE = (gethui and gethui()) or game:GetService("CoreGui")
local STATS = game:GetService("Stats")
local Camera = workspace.CurrentCamera
local Lighting = game:GetService("Lighting")

-- [PC SCALING & DETECTION]
local isMobile = (UIS.TouchEnabled and not UIS.KeyboardEnabled) or Camera.ViewportSize.X < 900
local MainWidth = isMobile and 580 or 900
local MainHeight = isMobile and 380 or 600
local SideWidth = isMobile and 150 or 230

-- [CONFIG / STATE]
local Zenith = {
    Aimbot = { Enabled = false, Smooth = 5, FOV = 200 },
    Visuals = { 
        ESP = false, 
        Boxes = false, 
        Names = false, 
        HitboxESP = false,
        ShowCircle = true,
        UnlockFPS = false 
    },
    Engine = {
        AutoSteal = false,
        GrabRadius = 20,
        AutoDuel = false,
        AutoHit = false,
        AntiHit = false, -- Advanced Anti-Ragdoll Logic
        SlowMo = false,
        TallJump = false,
        AntiTrap = true,
        AntiSentry = true,
        Unwalk = false,
        Speed = false, speedVal = 60,
        AutoChase = false,
        Spin = false, spinVal = 70,
        SpinBot = false,
        Jump = false, jumpVal = 50,
        Galaxy = false, galaxyVal = 45,
        LowLag = false,
        Optimizer = false
    },
        IsStealing = false,
        Progress = 0,
        CurrentTarget = nil,
        PinnedButtons = {},
        SavedSpeed = 60,
        StealingState = false,
        Toggles = {}
    },
    Keybinds = {}
}

-- [THEME]
local Theme = {
    Main = Color3.fromRGB(10, 15, 25),
    Sidebar = Color3.fromRGB(5, 8, 15),
    Accent = Color3.fromRGB(0, 255, 255), -- Neon Cyan
    AccentGlow = Color3.fromRGB(0, 180, 200),
    Text = Color3.fromRGB(255, 255, 255),
    Dim = Color3.fromRGB(150, 180, 200),
    Border = Color3.fromRGB(0, 150, 180)
}

-- [CORE HELPERS]
local function create(c, props)
    local obj = Instance.new(c)
    for k, v in pairs(props or {}) do obj[k] = v end
    return obj
end

-- [FPS UNLOCKER]
local function setFPS(v)
    if setfpscap then setfpscap(v) end
end

-- [ANTI-RESET ENGINE (REMOTE KILLER)]
local DisabledRemotes = {}
local function killRemote(remote)
    if not remote:IsA("RemoteEvent") or not getconnections then return end
    local name = remote.Name:lower()
    local keys = {"ragdoll", "reset", "damage", "death", "useitem", "combatservice"}
    for _, k in pairs(keys) do
        if name:find(k) then
            for _, c in pairs(getconnections(remote.OnClientEvent)) do
                if c.Disable then c:Disable() table.insert(DisabledRemotes, c) end
            end
            break
        end
    end
end
task.spawn(function()
    for _, v in pairs(REPLICATED:GetDescendants()) do killRemote(v) end
    REPLICATED.DescendantAdded:Connect(killRemote)
end)

local function tween(obj, t, goal, style)
    local tw = TS:Create(obj, TweenInfo.new(t, style or Enum.EasingStyle.Quart, Enum.EasingDirection.Out), goal)
    tw:Play()
    return tw
end

local function makeDraggable(obj)
    local d, ds, sp
    obj.InputBegan:Connect(function(i) if i.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton1 or i.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Touch then d = true; ds = i.Position; sp = obj.Position end end)
    obj.InputEnded:Connect(function(i) if i.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton1 or i.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Touch then d = false end end)
    UIS.InputChanged:Connect(function(i) if d and (i.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.MouseMovement or i.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Touch) then local dl = i.Position - ds; obj.Position = UDim2.new(sp.X.Scale, sp.X.Offset + dl.X, sp.Y.Scale, sp.Y.Offset + dl.Y) end end)
end

-- [HUD PIN SYSTEM]
local function createPinnedButton(name, callback, defaultState)
    if Zenith.Internal.PinnedButtons[name] then return end
    local MainGui = CORE:FindFirstChild("ZenithEnginePC")
    local btn = create("TextButton", {Size = UDim2.new(0, 50, 0, 50), Position = UDim2.new(0.8, 0, 0.5, 0), BackgroundColor3 = (defaultState and Theme.Accent or Theme.Sidebar), Text = name:sub(1,3):upper(), TextColor3 = Theme.Text, Font = "GothamBold", TextSize = 10, ZIndex = 5000, Parent = MainGui})
    create("UICorner", {CornerRadius = UDim.new(1,0), Parent = btn}); create("UIStroke", {Color = Theme.Accent, Thickness = 2, Parent = btn})
    makeDraggable(btn); local state = defaultState
    local function update(ns) state = ns; btn.BackgroundColor3 = (state and Theme.Accent or Theme.Sidebar) end
    btn.MouseButton1Click:Connect(function() state = not state; callback(state); update(state) end)
    local pressStart = 0
    btn.InputBegan:Connect(function(i) if i.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Touch or i.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton1 then pressStart = tick() end end)
    btn.InputEnded:Connect(function(i) if (i.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Touch or i.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton1) and (tick() - pressStart > 1.5) then btn:Destroy(); Zenith.Internal.PinnedButtons[name] = nil end end)
    Zenith.Internal.PinnedButtons[name] = {btn = btn, update = update}
    return btn
end

-- [METATABLE BYPASS & PROTECTION]
local function initBypass()
    if not getrawmetatable then return end
    local mt = getrawmetatable(game)
    local oldIndex = mt.__index
    local oldNewindex = mt.__newindex
    if setreadonly then setreadonly(mt, false) end
    
    mt.__index = newcclosure(function(t, k)
        if not checkcaller() then
            if t == h and k == "Health" and Zenith.Engine.AntiHit then return oldIndex(t, "MaxHealth") end
            if t == h and (k == "WalkSpeed" or k == "JumpPower") then return (k == "WalkSpeed" and 16 or 50) end
        end
        return oldIndex(t, k)
    end)
    
    mt.__newindex = newcclosure(function(t, k, v)
        if not checkcaller() and Zenith.Engine.AntiHit then
            if t == hrp and (k == "Velocity" or k == "AssemblyLinearVelocity") then return end
            if t == h and (k == "WalkSpeed" or k == "JumpPower") then return end
        end
        return oldNewindex(t, k, v)
    end)
    
    if setreadonly then setreadonly(mt, true) end
end
task.spawn(initBypass)

-- [CONFIG SYSTEM]
local function saveConfig()
    local data = HttpService:JSONEncode(Zenith)
    if writefile then writefile("ZenithPC_Config.json", data) end
end
local function loadConfig()
    if isfile and isfile("ZenithPC_Config.json") then
        local data = HttpService:JSONDecode(readfile("ZenithPC_Config.json"))
        for k, v in pairs(data) do 
            if k == "Keybinds" then
                Zenith.Keybinds = v
                for name, keyName in pairs(v) do
                    if Zenith.Internal.Toggles[name] and Zenith.Internal.Toggles[name].kbBtn then
                        Zenith.Internal.Toggles[name].kbBtn.Text = "["..keyName.."]"
                    end
                end
            elseif type(v) == "table" then 
                for k2, v2 in pairs(v) do Zenith[k][k2] = v2 end 
            end 
        end
    end
end

-- [GLOBAL KEYBIND LISTENER]
local waitingForKey = nil
UIS.InputBegan:Connect(function(input, gpe)
    if gpe then return end
    if waitingForKey then
        if input.KeyCode ~= Enum.KeyCode.Unknown then
            local name = waitingForKey
            local keyName = input.KeyCode.Name
            Zenith.Keybinds[name] = keyName
            if Zenith.Internal.Toggles[name] and Zenith.Internal.Toggles[name].kbBtn then
                Zenith.Internal.Toggles[name].kbBtn.Text = "["..keyName.."]"
            end
            waitingForKey = nil
        end
        return
    end
    
    local pressed = input.KeyCode.Name
    for name, keyName in pairs(Zenith.Keybinds) do
        if keyName == pressed then
            local t = Zenith.Internal.Toggles[name]
            if t then t.cb(not t.state()) end
        end
    end
end)

-- [PLAYER REFERENCES]
local hrp, h, waist, neck
local function updateRefs()
    local c = LP.Character or LP.CharacterAdded:Wait()
    h = c:WaitForChild("Humanoid", 10)
    hrp = c:WaitForChild("HumanoidRootPart", 10)
    
    local torso = c:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso") or c:FindFirstChild("Torso")
    waist = torso and (torso:FindFirstChild("Waist") or torso:FindFirstChild("RootJoint"))
    neck = (c:FindFirstChild("Head") and c.Head:FindFirstChild("Neck")) or (torso and torso:FindFirstChild("Neck"))
    
    if h then
        local blocked = {Enum.HumanoidStateType.Ragdoll, Enum.HumanoidStateType.FallingDown, Enum.HumanoidStateType.Dead}
        for _, s in pairs(blocked) do h:SetStateEnabled(s, false) end
    end
end
task.spawn(updateRefs); LP.CharacterAdded:Connect(updateRefs)

-- ENGINE LOGIC
local processedTraps = {}
local function createTrapBarrier(trapModel)
    if processedTraps[trapModel] or not Zenith.Engine.AntiTrap then return end
    task.wait(0.5); if not trapModel.Parent then return end
    processedTraps[trapModel] = true
    local cf, size = trapModel:GetBoundingBox()
    local barrier = create("Part", {Name = "TrapBarrier", Size = size + Vector3.new(6, 10, 6), CFrame = cf, Anchored = true, Transparency = 0.85, Material = "ForceField", Color = Theme.Accent, Parent = WORKSPACE})
    for _, p in pairs(trapModel:GetDescendants()) do if p:IsA("BasePart") then p.CanCollide = false end end

-- [ADVANCED ANTI-RAGDOLL]
local function initNewAntiRagdoll()
    local ragdollRemote = REPLICATED:WaitForChild("Packages", 5) and REPLICATED.Packages:WaitForChild("Ragdoll", 5) and REPLICATED.Packages.Ragdoll:WaitForChild("Ragdoll", 5)
    local PlayerModule = require(LP:WaitForChild("PlayerScripts"):WaitForChild("PlayerModule"))
    local Controls = PlayerModule:GetControls()
    local updating = false

    local function getRoot() return LP.Character and LP.Character:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart") end
    local function forceEnableControls(duration)
        local start = tick()
        RS.RenderStepped:Connect(function() if not Zenith.Engine.AntiHit or tick() - start > duration then return end Controls:Enable() end)
    end

    local function addLinearVelocity()
        if not Zenith.Engine.AntiHit then return end
        local root = getRoot(); local humanoid = LP.Character and LP.Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")
        if not root or not humanoid then return end
        if not root:FindFirstChild("AntiRagdollLV") then
            local attachment = create("Attachment", {Name = "AntiRagdollAttachment", Parent = root})
            create("LinearVelocity", {Name = "AntiRagdollLV", Attachment0 = attachment, MaxForce = math.huge, RelativeTo = Enum.ActuatorRelativeTo.World, VectorVelocity = Vector3.zero, Parent = root})
        end
        forceEnableControls(0.1); humanoid:ChangeState(Enum.HumanoidStateType.Freefall)
        if not updating then
            updating = true; task.spawn(function()
                while Zenith.Engine.AntiHit and LP:GetAttribute("RagdollEndTime") and root:FindFirstChild("AntiRagdollLV") do
                    local lv = root:FindFirstChild("AntiRagdollLV")
                    if lv and humanoid then local dir = humanoid.MoveDirection; lv.VectorVelocity = (dir.Magnitude > 0.1) and (dir.Unit * humanoid.WalkSpeed) or Vector3.zero end
                    task.wait(0.05)
                end
                updating = false
            end)
        end
    end
    local function removeLinearVelocity() local root = getRoot(); if root then local lv = root:FindFirstChild("AntiRagdollLV"); if lv then lv:Destroy() end; local att = root:FindFirstChild("AntiRagdollAttachment"); if att then att:Destroy() end end end

    LP.AttributeChanged:Connect(function(attr) if Zenith.Engine.AntiHit and attr == "RagdollEndTime" then if LP:GetAttribute("RagdollEndTime") then addLinearVelocity() else removeLinearVelocity() end end end)
    if ragdollRemote then ragdollRemote.OnClientEvent:Connect(function(p1, p2) if Zenith.Engine.AntiHit and (p1 == "Destroy" or p2 == "manualD") then removeLinearVelocity() end end) end
end
task.spawn(initNewAntiRagdoll)

local function runOptimizer()
    if not Zenith.Engine.Optimizer then return end
    Lighting.GlobalShadows = false; Lighting.FogEnd = 1000
    settings().Rendering.QualityLevel = Enum.QualityLevel.Level01
    Lighting.Brightness = 0; Lighting.EnvironmentDiffuseScale = 0; Lighting.EnvironmentSpecularScale = 0
    Lighting.Ambient = Color3.fromRGB(160,160,160); Lighting.OutdoorAmbient = Color3.fromRGB(160,160,160)
    for _, v in pairs(Lighting:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("PostEffect") then v.Enabled = false end end
    local function strip(char) if not char then return end; for _, v in pairs(char:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("Accessory") or v:IsA("Shirt") or v:IsA("Pants") or v:IsA("Face") or v:IsA("CharacterMesh") or v:IsA("ShirtGraphic") then v:Destroy() end end end
    if LP.Character then strip(LP.Character) end
    task.spawn(function()
        while Zenith.Engine.Optimizer do
            for _, model in pairs(WORKSPACE:GetChildren()) do if model:IsA("Model") and model:FindFirstChildWhichIsA("Humanoid") then strip(model) end end
            task.wait(0.3)
        end
    end)
end

RS.Heartbeat:Connect(function()
    if not hrp or not h then return end
    -- Speed Booster
    if Zenith.Engine.Speed then 
        local m = h.MoveDirection; if m.Magnitude > 0 then hrp.AssemblyLinearVelocity = Vector3.new(m.X * Zenith.Engine.speedVal, hrp.AssemblyLinearVelocity.Y, m.Z * Zenith.Engine.speedVal) end 
    end

    -- Spin Bot
    if Zenith.Engine.SpinBot then
        local spin = hrp:FindFirstChild("ZenithSpin") or create("BodyAngularVelocity", {Name = "ZenithSpin", MaxTorque = Vector3.new(0, math.huge, 0), Parent = hrp})
        spin.AngularVelocity = Vector3.new(0, Zenith.Engine.spinVal, 0)
    else
        if hrp:FindFirstChild("ZenithSpin") then hrp.ZenithSpin:Destroy() end
    end

    -- Galaxy (Gravity) Reduction logic
    if Zenith.Engine.Galaxy then
        local gf = hrp:FindFirstChild("ZenithGalaxy") or create("BodyForce", {Name = "ZenithGalaxy", Parent = hrp})
        local lift = (196.2 - (196.2 * (Zenith.Engine.galaxyVal/100)))
        gf.Force = Vector3.new(0, lift * hrp:GetMass(), 0)
    else
        if hrp:FindFirstChild("ZenithGalaxy") then hrp.ZenithGalaxy:Destroy() end
    end

    if Zenith.Engine.SlowMo and hrp.AssemblyLinearVelocity.Y < -5 then hrp.AssemblyLinearVelocity = Vector3.new(hrp.AssemblyLinearVelocity.X, -5, hrp.AssemblyLinearVelocity.Z) end
    if Zenith.Engine.Unwalk then for _, v in pairs(h:GetPlayingAnimationTracks()) do v:Stop() end end
    
    if Zenith.Engine.AutoHit and hrp then
        local bat = LP.Character:FindFirstChild("Bat") or LP.Backpack:FindFirstChild("Bat")
        if bat then
            local closest, dist = nil, 25
            for _, v in pairs(game:GetService("Players"):GetPlayers()) do
                if v ~= LP and v.Character and v.Character:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart") then
                    local d = (hrp.Position - v.Character.HumanoidRootPart.Position).Magnitude
                    if d < dist then dist = d; closest = v.Character end
                end
            end
            if closest then if bat.Parent == LP.Backpack then h:EquipTool(bat) end; bat:Activate(); local rem = bat:FindFirstChildOfClass("RemoteEvent"); if rem then rem:FireServer(closest.HumanoidRootPart.Position, closest.HumanoidRootPart) end end
        end
    end

    -- Bat Aimbot Chase
    if Zenith.Engine.AutoChase and hrp and h then
        local target, dist = nil, 1000
        for _, v in pairs(game:GetService("Players"):GetPlayers()) do
            if v ~= LP and v.Character and v.Character:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart") and v.Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") and v.Character.Humanoid.Health > 0 then
                local d = (hrp.Position - v.Character.HumanoidRootPart.Position).Magnitude
                if d < dist then dist = d; target = v.Character.HumanoidRootPart end
            end
        end
        if target then
            local dir = (target.Position - hrp.Position).Unit
            hrp.AssemblyLinearVelocity = Vector3.new(dir.X * Zenith.Engine.speedVal, hrp.AssemblyLinearVelocity.Y, dir.Z * Zenith.Engine.speedVal)
            hrp.CFrame = CFrame.new(hrp.Position, Vector3.new(target.Position.X, hrp.Position.Y, target.Position.Z))
        end
    end
end)

local aimTarget = nil

end)

local InternalStealCache = {}
local function buildStealCallbacks(prompt)
    if InternalStealCache[prompt] then return end; local data = {hold = {}, trigger = {}, ready = true}
    local h_ok, h_c = pcall(getconnections, prompt.PromptButtonHoldBegan); if h_ok and type(h_c) == "table" then for _, c in pairs(h_c) do if c.Function then table.insert(data.hold, c.Function) end end end
    local t_ok, t_c = pcall(getconnections, prompt.Triggered); if t_ok and type(t_c) == "table" then for _, c in pairs(t_c) do if c.Function then table.insert(data.trigger, c.Function) end end end
    InternalStealCache[prompt] = data
end
local function executeSteal(prompt)
    if Zenith.Internal.IsStealing then return end; Zenith.Internal.IsStealing = true; Zenith.Internal.Progress = 0
    task.spawn(function() 
        local start = tick(); while tick() - start < 0.6 do Zenith.Internal.Progress = (tick() - start) / 0.6; task.wait(0.05) end; Zenith.Internal.Progress = 1
        if fireproximityprompt then 
            pcall(function() fireproximityprompt(prompt) end) 
        else 
            prompt.HoldDuration = 0; prompt:InputBegan(Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton1); prompt:InputEnded(Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton1) 
        end
        task.wait(0.2); Zenith.Internal.IsStealing = false; Zenith.Internal.Progress = 0
    end)
end

    end end
end)

            local f = create("Frame", {Size = UDim2.new(1, -20, 0, 36), BackgroundTransparency = 1, Parent = c})
            local l = create("TextLabel", {Size = UDim2.new(0.4, 0, 1, 0), Text = n, TextColor3 = Theme.Text, Font = "GothamSemibold", TextSize = 14, BackgroundTransparency = 1, TextXAlignment = "Left", Parent = f})
            
            local kbBtn = create("TextButton", {Size = UDim2.new(0, 50, 0, 22), Position = UDim2.new(0.42, 0, 0.2, 0), BackgroundColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(30,30,40), Text = Zenith.Keybinds[n] and "["..Zenith.Keybinds[n].."]" or "[NONE]", TextColor3 = Theme.Accent, Font = "GothamBold", TextSize = 10, Parent = f})
            create("UICorner", {CornerRadius = UDim.new(0, 6), Parent = kbBtn})
            
            local pin = create("TextButton", {Size = UDim2.new(0, 26, 0, 22), Position = UDim2.new(0.6, 0, 0.2, 0), BackgroundColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(30,35,45), Text = "+", TextColor3 = Theme.Accent, Font = "GothamBold", TextSize = 15, Parent = f}); create("UICorner", {CornerRadius = UDim.new(0, 7), Parent = pin})
            local unpin = create("TextButton", {Size = UDim2.new(0, 26, 0, 22), Position = UDim2.new(0.72, 0, 0.2, 0), BackgroundColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(65,25,25), Text = "x", TextColor3 = Theme.Text, Font = "GothamBold", TextSize = 15, Parent = f}); create("UICorner", {CornerRadius = UDim.new(0, 7), Parent = unpin})
            local b = create("TextButton", {Size = UDim2.new(0, 45, 0, 22), Position = UDim2.new(0.85, 0, 0.2, 0), BackgroundColor3 = (d and Theme.Accent or Color3.fromRGB(45,50,60)), Text = "", Parent = f}); create("UICorner", {CornerRadius = UDim.new(1, 0), Parent = b}); local s = d
            local function updateToggle(ns) s = ns; b.BackgroundColor3 = (s and Theme.Accent or Color3.fromRGB(45,50,60)); if Zenith.Internal.PinnedButtons[n] then Zenith.Internal.PinnedButtons[n].update(s) end; cb(s) end
            
            Zenith.Internal.Toggles[n] = {cb = updateToggle, state = function() return s end, kbBtn = kbBtn}
            
            b.MouseButton1Click:Connect(function() updateToggle(not s) end)
            kbBtn.MouseButton1Click:Connect(function() kbBtn.Text = "[...]"; waitingForKey = n end)
            pin.MouseButton1Click:Connect(function() createPinnedButton(n, updateToggle, s) end)
            unpin.MouseButton1Click:Connect(function() if Zenith.Internal.PinnedButtons[n] then Zenith.Internal.PinnedButtons[n].btn:Destroy(); Zenith.Internal.PinnedButtons[n] = nil end; updateToggle(false) end)
        end
        function Ele:CreateSlider(n, mn, mx, df, cb)
            local f = create("Frame", {Size = UDim2.new(1, -20, 0, 50), BackgroundTransparency = 1, Parent = c})
            local l = create("TextLabel", {Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 0, 25), Text = n..": "..df, TextColor3 = Theme.Dim, Font = "Gotham", TextSize = 13, BackgroundTransparency = 1, TextXAlignment = "Left", Parent = f})
            local bg = create("Frame", {Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 0, 7), Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 32), BackgroundColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(35, 40, 50), Parent = f}); local fill = create("Frame", {Size = UDim2.new((df-mn)/(mx-mn), 0, 1, 0), BackgroundColor3 = Theme.Accent, Parent = bg}); local down = false
            local function update() local p = math.clamp((UIS:GetMouseLocation().X - bg.AbsolutePosition.X) / bg.AbsoluteSize.X, 0, 1); local v = math.floor(mn + (mx-mn)*p); l.Text = n..": "..v; fill.Size = UDim2.new(p,0,1,0); cb(v) end
            bg.InputBegan:Connect(function(i) if i.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton1 or i.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Touch then down = true; update() end end); UIS.InputEnded:Connect(function(i) if i.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton1 or i.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Touch then down = false end end); UIS.InputChanged:Connect(function(i) if down and (i.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.MouseMovement or i.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Touch) then update() end end)
        end
        return Ele
    end
    return Obj
end

local CA = Combat:CreateSection("Combat Aim"); CA:CreateToggle("Spinal Aimbot", false, function(v) Zenith.Aimbot.Enabled = v end); CA:CreateSlider("Smoothness", 1, 20, 5, function(v) Zenith.Aimbot.Smooth = v end)
local CD = Combat:CreateSection("Combat Master"); CD:CreateToggle("Auto Duel Pathing", false, function(v) Zenith.Engine.AutoDuel = v; if v then initDuelPath() end end); CD:CreateToggle("Bat Aimbot Chase", false, function(v) Zenith.Engine.AutoChase = v end); CD:CreateToggle("Auto Hit KillAura", false, function(v) Zenith.Engine.AutoHit = v end); CD:CreateToggle("Anti-Hit (Advanced)", false, function(v) Zenith.Engine.AntiHit = v end)
local MM = Move:CreateSection("Vander Movement"); MM:CreateToggle("Global Speed Booster", false, function(v) Zenith.Engine.Speed = v end); MM:CreateSlider("Speed Val", 16, 250, 60, function(v) Zenith.Engine.speedVal = v end); MM:CreateToggle("Infinite Jump", false, function(v) Zenith.Engine.Jump = v end); MM:CreateSlider("Jump Power", 10, 150, 50, function(v) Zenith.Engine.jumpVal = v end)
local ME = Move:CreateSection("Movement Extra"); ME:CreateToggle("Spin Bot", false, function(v) Zenith.Engine.SpinBot = v end); ME:CreateSlider("Spin Speed", 5, 200, 70, function(v) Zenith.Engine.spinVal = v end); ME:CreateToggle("Tall Jump Bypass", false, function(v) Zenith.Engine.TallJump = v end); ME:CreateToggle("Slow Fall / Slomo", false, function(v) Zenith.Engine.SlowMo = v end); ME:CreateToggle("Galaxy Gravity", false, function(v) Zenith.Engine.Galaxy = v end); ME:CreateSlider("Gravity Amount", 0, 100, 45, function(v) Zenith.Engine.galaxyVal = v end)
local VI = Visuals:CreateSection("World Intel"); VI:CreateToggle("Highlight ESP", false, function(v) Zenith.Visuals.ESP = v end); VI:CreateToggle("Show NameTags", false, function(v) Zenith.Visuals.Names = v end); VI:CreateToggle("Box Hitbox ESP", false, function(v) Zenith.Visuals.HitboxESP = v end)
local VM = Visuals:CreateSection("HUD Extras"); VM:CreateToggle("Show Grab Circle", true, function(v) Zenith.Visuals.ShowCircle = v end); VM:CreateToggle("Unlock FPS", false, function(v) Zenith.Visuals.UnlockFPS = v; setFPS(v and 999 or 60) end)
local MA = Misc:CreateSection("Automation"); MA:CreateToggle("Instant Grabber", false, function(v) Zenith.Engine.AutoSteal = v end); MA:CreateSlider("Grab Distance", 5, 100, 20, function(v) Zenith.Engine.GrabRadius = v end)
local MX = Misc:CreateSection("Exploits"); MX:CreateToggle("Anti-Ragdoll God", false, function(v) Zenith.Engine.AntiRagdoll = v end); MX:CreateToggle("Unwalk (No Anims)", false, function(v) Zenith.Engine.Unwalk = v end); local MP = Misc:CreateSection("Performance"); MP:CreateToggle("Performance Optimizer", false, function(v) Zenith.Engine.Optimizer = v; if v then runOptimizer() end end); MP:CreateToggle("Low-Lag Mode", false, function(v) if v then for _,x in pairs(game:GetDescendants()) do if x:IsA("BasePart") then x.Material = Enum.Material.SmoothPlastic end end end end)

local SS = Settings:CreateSection("Config Manager")
local clrBtn = create("TextButton", {Size = UDim2.new(1, -20, 0, 38), BackgroundColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(70, 25, 25), Text = "CLEAR ALL HUD SHORTCUTS", TextColor3 = Theme.Text, Font = "GothamBold", TextSize = 12, Parent = SS.v})
local saveBtn = create("TextButton", {Size = UDim2.new(1, -20, 0, 38), BackgroundColor3 = Theme.Sidebar, Text = "SAVE CURRENT CONFIG", TextColor3 = Theme.Accent, Font = "GothamBold", TextSize = 14, Parent = SS.v})
local loadBtn = create("TextButton", {Size = UDim2.new(1, -20, 0, 38), BackgroundColor3 = Theme.Sidebar, Text = "LOAD SAVED CONFIG", TextColor3 = Theme.Accent, Font = "GothamBold", TextSize = 14, Parent = SS.v})
create("UICorner", {CornerRadius = UDim.new(0, 12), Parent = clrBtn}); create("UICorner", {CornerRadius = UDim.new(0, 12), Parent = saveBtn}); create("UICorner", {CornerRadius = UDim.new(0, 12), Parent = loadBtn})
clrBtn.MouseButton1Click:Connect(function() for n, data in pairs(Zenith.Internal.PinnedButtons) do if data.btn then data.btn:Destroy() end end; Zenith.Internal.PinnedButtons = {}; clrBtn.Text = "HUD CLEARED!"; task.wait(1); clrBtn.Text = "CLEAR ALL HUD SHORTCUTS" end)
